The average time taken to detect a security incident.
IT Support+Information Technology (IT)+C.FORMULA: Total Time Taken to Detect Security Incidents / Number of Incidents

IT Support+Information Technology (IT)+C.EXPLANATION: The average time taken to resolve a security incident.
IT Support+Information Technology (IT)+C.FORMULA: Total Time Taken to Resolve Security Incidents / Number of Incidents

IT Support+Information Technology (IT)+C.EXPLANATION: Measures adherence to established security policies.
IT Support+Information Technology (IT)+C.FORMULA: (Number of Compliant Actions / Total Actions Required by Policies) * 100

IT Support+Information Technology (IT)+C.EXPLANATION: The average time to fix vulnerabilities after they are discovered.
IT Support+Information Technology (IT)+C.FORMULA: Total Time to Apply Vulnerability Patches / Number of Vulnerabilities

IT Support+Information Technology (IT)+C.EXPLANATION: The percentage of employees who complete security awareness training.
IT Support+Information Technology (IT)+C.FORMULA: (Number of Employees Completed Training / Total Employees Required to Complete Training) * 100

IT Support+Information Technology (IT)+C.EXPLANATION: Measures the effectiveness of systems in detecting unauthorized access attempts.
IT Support+Information Technology (IT)+C.FORMULA: (Number of Intrusions Detected / Total Number of Intrusions Attempted) * 100
